toDoColumn.name: Apply fungicide to control CLR.
toDoColumn.description: Spray appropriate fungicide on coffee plants to combat Coffee Leaf Rust.

toDoColumn.name: Monitor soil moisture and adjust irrigation.
toDoColumn.description: Check soil moisture levels regularly and adjust irrigation as needed to ensure optimal plant health.

toDoColumn.name: Conduct a visual inspection of the crop for signs of BES.
toDoColumn.description: Observe coffee plants for symptoms of Brown Eye Spot disease.

doingColumn.name: Record crop health observations in the system.
doingColumn.description: Log daily observations of coffee plant health and disease status in the BunaCare system.

doneColumn.name: Schedule a disease management workshop for farmers.
doneColumn.description: Plan and organize a workshop to educate farmers about effective disease management practices.

doneColumn.name: Purchase additional fungicides and bactericides.
doneColumn.description: Procure fungicides and bactericides to be used in disease control measures.

doneColumn.name: Conduct soil testing for nutrient analysis.
doneColumn.description: Collect soil samples for laboratory analysis to assess nutrient levels and soil health.
